ConnectionIdleTimeout.description:
The amount of time to allow a connection to have no observed traffic before considering
it idle and eligible to close.

CustomEndpointAddress.description:
The address to use for establishing a connection to the Event Hubs service, allowing network requests to be
routed through any application gateways or other paths needed for the host environment.

ReceiveBufferSizeInBytes.description: The size of the buffer used for receiving information via the active transport.

SendBufferSizeInBytes.description: The size of the buffer used for sending information via the active transport.

TransportType.description:
The type of protocol and transport that will be used for communicating with the Event Hubs
service.

ClientOptions.description: The set of options that can be specified when creating an 'Azure.Messaging.EventHubs.EventHubConnection' to configure its behavior.

ConnectionString.description: Gets or sets the connection string used to connect to the Service Bus namespace.

ConsumerGroup.description: Gets or sets the name of the consumer group.

EventHubName.description: Gets or sets the name of the Event Hub.

HealthCheckQueueName.description: Name of the queue used by the health check. Mandatory to get health checks enabled.

HealthCheckTopicName.description: Name of the topic used by the health check. Mandatory to get health checks enabled.

Namespace.description: Gets or sets the fully qualified Service Bus namespace.

Tracing.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the OpenTelemetry tracing is enabled or not.

EventHubs.description: Provides the client configuration settings for connecting to Azure Service Bus.
